item.content:encoded:
In meditation (ध्यान), what is more important, the stillness of mind or feeling the energy in the body?

Most important thing in meditation is neither stillness of mins nor feeling the energy of the body. There is something more important than both these and that is clarity/understanding. Your own understanding about the movement of your thoughts and why they are moving the way they are.

Your psychic energy is most important to go into deeper states if meditation and the movement of thoughts is what drains away this  energy.
